title: eq-date
description: The EqDateComponent is an Angular component used for rendering a date input field with various customization options. It supports view and edit modes, validation, and emits changes to the parent component. It also handles different date formats and localization.

properties.title: Date Picker
properties.hint: Choose a date from the calendar

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The current value of the date input. It should be in ISO date format.

inputs.name: placeholder
inputs.description: Placeholder text for the input. Defaults to an empty string.

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description: Whether the input is disabled. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: required
inputs.description: Whether the input is required. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: nullable
inputs.description: Whether the input can be null. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: The mode of the component, either 'view' or 'edit'. Defaults to 'view'.

inputs.name: hint
inputs.description: Hint text for the input. Defaults to an empty string.

inputs.name: size
inputs.description: The size of the input. Defaults to normal.

inputs.name: error
inputs.description: Error message to display when the input is invalid.

inputs.name: usage
inputs.description: The format in which the date should be displayed.

outputs.name: valueChange
outputs.description: Emits the new value when the date changes.
